com.amwe.bokbytarapp.Model.Database

Class DatabaseSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amwe.bokbytarapp.Model.Database.DatabaseSubject

  • public class DatabaseSubject
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsibility: This is the subject in the observer pattern. This will notify observers about related changes to the database Used by: AccountPage, ChatRoomPage, SearchPage Uses: ChatRoomAdapter, ListingAdapter
    Author:
    Magnus Andersson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addListingListener(java.util.List<Item> bookListings, ListingAdapter adapter)
      Listener for the common listings dataset, will notify observers upon creation and when dataset has changed
      static void addUserListener(java.util.List<Item> bookListings, ListingAdapter adapter, java.lang.String child)
      Listener for the current logged in user's own listings and favourites, will notify observers upon creation and when dataset has changed
      static void getChatRooms(java.util.List<com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot> items, ChatRoomAdapter chatRoomAdapter)
      Method used for getting chat rooms to be displayed in a list for the user

    • Method Detail

      • addListingListener

        public static void addListingListener(java.util.List<Item> bookListings,
                                      ListingAdapter adapter)
        Listener for the common listings dataset, will notify observers upon creation and when dataset has changed
        Parameters:
        bookListings - List the observer want data pushed on
        adapter - Observer to notify that there is new data

      • addUserListener

        public static void addUserListener(java.util.List<Item> bookListings,
                                   ListingAdapter adapter,
                                   java.lang.String child)
        Listener for the current logged in user's own listings and favourites, will notify observers upon creation and when dataset has changed
        Parameters:
        bookListings - The list the observer want data pushed on
        adapter - Observer to notify that there is new data
        child - Name of the child in the database that needs to be accessed.

      • getChatRooms

        public static void getChatRooms(java.util.List<com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot> items,
                                ChatRoomAdapter chatRoomAdapter)
        Method used for getting chat rooms to be displayed in a list for the user
        Parameters:
        items - - The list of chat rooms
        chatRoomAdapter - - The adapter which makes the list viewable & interactable
